titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Maps Collection

mods.note:
Since its establishment in 1968, Louisiana Sea Grant has worked to promote stewardship of the state's coastal resources through a combination of research, education and outreach programs critical to the cultural, economic and environmental health of Louisiana's coastal zone. Louisiana Sea Grant, based at LSU, is part of the National Sea Grant College Program, a network of 32 university-based programs in each of the U.S. coastal and Great Lakes states and Puerto Rico. Visit Louisiana Sea Grant online at www.laseagrant.org.

This collection was created by the LSU Libraries in partnership with Louisiana Sea Grant. Many maps are a part of the LSU Cartographic Information Center collection.

Related Collection

Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images
mods.abstract: The Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Maps Collection, contains USGS maps and other maps of Louisiana. This project was a collaboration between Louisiana Sea Grant and the LSU Libraries.
